content.text: Hi there, I'm a museum curator!
That's a cool job! I love museums.
Thanks! I spent last year learning about art and history so that I can be a better curator.
That's awesome! I love learning about art and history too.
What's your favorite type of art?
I'm not sure if I have a favorite type of art, but I love all kinds of art.
Me too! I think all art is beautiful in its own way.
I agree! What's your favorite museum?
I have a few favorites, but the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City is probably my favorite.
That's a great museum! I've been there a few times and I always love it.
Me too! It's such a huge museum with so much to see.
I know! It's hard to know where to start when you first go there.
Yeah, it can be overwhelming. But that's part of what makes it so great!
I agree! I always feel like I could spend days there and still not see everything.
Me too! I love going back to the Met every time I'm in New York City.
I wish I could go to the Met more often.
Me too! It's one of my favorite places in the world.
